commentBody: I too enjoyed this production which also included a brief pre-show introduction at which audience members are asked whether they would give priority to justice or mercy (and given a choice of either purple or gold colored beads to wear to illustrate their preference) and a post-show discussion about issues of justice and mercy laid out in the play. Given the very positive review, which ended by praising actress Jasmine Batchelor as "an Isabella for the ages," I wonder why this production was not selected as a Critic's Pick.
